# restify-options-builder

Automatically generates OPTIONS handlers for each register route.

## Usage

```js
var restify = require( 'restify' );
var restifyOptionsBuilder = require( 'restify-options-builder' );

var server = restify.createServer( { name: 'test ' } );

restifyOptionsBuilder( server, function( routing ) {

    routing.post( '/random', function create( req, res, next ) {
        res.send( 201, Math.random().toString( 36 ).substr( 3, 8 ) );
        return next();
    } );

} );
```
